stories.title: Air Force, Northrop Grumman strike $4.5B deal to speed B-21 bomber productionPublished4 minutes agoThe agreement boosts annual output of the next-generation stealth bomber by 25%, with the first aircraft set to reach Ellsworth AFB in 2027.30 sources
Wall Street banks turn bearish on Treasuries after tariff ruling80 sources
Supreme Court clears pilot union's fraud suit against Boeing44 sources
Bessent personally led January yen rate check60 sources

Dimon says he'll remain JPMorgan CEO for 'a few years'Published59 minutes agoThe 69-year-old made the comments at an investor day event where JPMorgan reaffirmed its $105 billion expense outlook and 17% return target.111 sources

Software stocks shed $224B as Anthropic AI tools fuel selloffPublished2 hours agoIBM suffered its worst single-day drop since 2000 after Anthropic detailed how its Claude AI can automate costly COBOL system modernization.65 sources
FedEx sues US for full tariff refund after IEEPA duties struck down91 sources
Fed proposes rule barring examiners from using reputation risk in bank oversight51 sources
DOJ, FTC launch effort to rewrite antitrust rules on competitor collaboration51 sources

KKR-backed ambulance giant taps banks for $1B IPOPublished3 hours agoGlobal Medical Response, the largest U.S. air and ground emergency medical services provider, selected JPMorgan and Bank of America to lead the offering, Bloomberg reported.68 sources

Exxon seeks compensation from Cuba at Supreme CourtPublished3 hours agoThe energy giant argued Monday that a 1996 law overrides Cuba's sovereign immunity, allowing compensation for assets seized during the 1960 revolution.51 sources

JPMorgan raises income forecast, defends $2B weekly spend118 sources
Over half of U.S. homeowners hold sub-4% rates, fueling market gridlock84 sources

Nvidia to report earnings Wednesday as options market prices in big swingPublished4 hours agoAnalysts expect earnings of $1.53 per share on revenue of about $65.7 billion, with Polymarket bettors overwhelmingly predicting a beat.70 sources

Binance investigators traced $1.7B to Iran-linked entities, NYT reportsPublished5 hours agoThe New York Times report lands as pardoned Binance co-founder Changpeng Zhao made his first U.S. return last week at a Trump family crypto summit.55 sources

Starlink cuts prices aggressively ahead of SpaceX IPO80 sources

Cybersecurity stocks extend sell-off after Anthropic AI tool launchPublished6 hours agoMajor cybersecurity firms lost ground for a second straight day as investors weighed whether AI-native tools could displace established security platforms.69 sources
